object.name: ChosenInlineResult
object.description:
Represents a result of an inline query that was chosen by the user and sent to their chat partner.
Note: It is necessary to enable inline feedback via @BotFather in order to receive these objects in updates.
object.html_description:
Represents a result of an inline query that was chosen by the user and sent to their chat partner.

Note: It is necessary to enable inline feedback via @BotFather in order to receive these objects in updates.
object.rst_description:
Represents a `result <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#inlinequeryresult>`_ of an inline query that was chosen by the user and sent to their chat partner.
**Note:** It is necessary to enable `inline feedback <https://core.telegram.org/bots/inline#collecting-feedback>`_ via `@BotFather <https://t.me/botfather>`_ in order to receive these objects in updates.

annotations.description: The unique identifier for the result that was chosen
annotations.html_description: The unique identifier for the result that was chosen
annotations.rst_description: The unique identifier for the result that was chosen
annotations.name: result_id

annotations.description: The user that chose the result
annotations.rst_description: The user that chose the result
annotations.name: from

annotations.description: Sender location, only for bots that require user location
annotations.html_description: Optional. Sender location, only for bots that require user location
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Sender location, only for bots that require user location
annotations.name: location

annotations.description: Identifier of the sent inline message. Available only if there is an inline keyboard attached to the message. Will be also received in callback queries and can be used to edit the message.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Identifier of the sent inline message. Available only if there is an inline keyboard attached to the message. Will be also received in callback queries and can be used to edit the message.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Identifier of the sent inline message. Available only if there is an `inline keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#inlinekeyboardmarkup>`_ attached to the message. Will be also received in `callback queries <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#callbackquery>`_ and can be used to `edit <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#updating-messages>`_ the message.
annotations.name: inline_message_id

annotations.description: The query that was used to obtain the result
annotations.html_description: The query that was used to obtain the result
annotations.rst_description: The query that was used to obtain the result
annotations.name: query
